data.name: FileDoesNotExist
data.value: File does not exist: '{0}'.

data.name: Magics_ErrorMessage_CannotBeUsedTogether
data.value: The {0} and {1} options cannot be used together.

data.name: Magics_import_Description
data.value: Runs another notebook or source code file inline.

data.name: Magics_log_Description
data.value: Enables session logging.

data.name: Magics_set_byref_Description
data.value: Shares the specified value by reference if kernels are in the same process.

data.name: Magics_set_Description
data.value: Sets a value in the current kernel

data.name: Magics_set_ErrorMessage_SharingByReference
data.value: Sharing by reference is not allowed when kernels are remote.

data.name: Magics_set_mime_type_Description
data.value: The MIME type by which the value should be represented. This will often determine how an object will be formatted into a string.

data.name: Magics_set_mime_type_ErrorMessage_CannotBeUsed
data.value: The --mime-type and --byref options cannot be used together.

data.name: Magics_set_name_Description
data.value: The name of the value to be created in the current kernel.

data.name: Magics_set_value_Description
data.value: The value to be set. @input:user_prompt allows you to prompt the user for this value. Values can be requested from other kernels by name, for example @csharp:variableName.

data.name: Magics_share_as_Description
data.value: The name to give the the value in the importing kernel.

data.name: Magics_share_Description
data.value: Get a value from one kernel and create a copy (or a reference if the kernels are in the same process) in another.

data.name: Magics_share_from_Description
data.value: The name of the kernel to get the value from.

data.name: Magics_share_mime_type_Description
data.value: Share the value as a string formatted to the specified MIME type.

data.name: Magics_share_name_Description
data.value: The name of the value to share. (This is also the default name of the value created in the destination kernel, unless --as is used to specify a different one.)

data.name: Magics_value_from_file_Description
data.value: Specifies a file whose contents will be stored.

data.name: Magics_value_from_url_Description
data.value: Specifies a URL whose content will be stored.

data.name: Magics_value_from_value_Description
data.value: Specifies a value to be stored directly. Specifying @input:value allows you to prompt the user for this value.

data.name: Magics_value_mime_type_Description
data.value: A mime type for the value. If specified, displays the value immediately as an output using the specified mime type.

data.name: Magics_value_name_Description
data.value: The name of the value to create. You can use #!share to retrieve this value from another subkernel.

data.name: Magics_whos_Description
data.value: Display the names of the current top-level variables and their values.

data.name: Magics_who_Description
data.value: Display the names of the current top-level variables.
